title: Cleric
content: v 5 Abjuration Action Touch a creature and negate any Charm, Petrification, Stun, or curse afflicting it. Melee HOLD MONSTER Lv 5 Enchantment Action Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits. 10 turns No effect on undead 18m WIS Save Concentration INSECT PLAGUE Lv 5 Conjuration Action 4 ~ 40 Damage 4d10 Piercing Locust attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks. 10 Turns On sa
